== Touch Developer Preview Troubleshooting Guide ==

This troubleshooting guide should help you diagnose and solve any problems that you encounter while installing the Ubuntu Touch Developer Preview. Before using it:

* Check out the <nowiki>[[..-..-ReleaseNotes|release notes]]</nowiki> to see if your issue is covered in there
* If your issue is neither covered in the release notes nor in this guide, please add it here and contribute improving it. You can also get help here:
** <nowiki>[[http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=ubuntu-phone|Asking on Ask Ubuntu]]</nowiki>
** Chatting in real-time on the <nowiki>[[http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=ubuntu-touch|#ubuntu-touch channel]]</nowiki>
** Discussing on the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-phone|mailing list]]</nowiki>

=== The installation fails with a blank screen on boot ===
